properties.address: Sennen Churchtown Hall, Penzance, Cornwall TR19 7AD
properties.description: Come and join us every "Souper Wednesday" for free soup, roll, cake, tea and coffee at our small Community Hall. A warm space with lots of friendly people and sociable chat! All welcome! The Hall has Charitable status and is run by a Committee of Trustees. It is situated near to the church, in the village of Sennen, near Penzance, Cornwall. The Hall is near to the beautiful Sennen Cove and just a mile from Land's End. It is situated within a large Community field. The Hall is for hire and can house 80 people.
properties.title: Sennen Churchtown Hall
